item.title: Report X-2024101009
item.description:
Report X-2024101009

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-10
  • City: NEW YORK
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN AIR PACKAGE AT THE DELIVERY DESTINATION CENTER NEEDED ADDITIONAL TAPING DUE TO THE SEAL OF ONE END OF THE BOX BROKE OPEN. WHILE RETAPING WE DISCOVERED IPHONES WERE INSIDE THE UNMARKED PACKAGE. FULL CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALS 17 USED IPHONES. AT LEAST FOUR OF THE IPHONES POWER ON WITH A LOW BATTERY STATUS. THE ADDITIONAL IPHONES DO NOT HAVE ENOUGH CHARGE TO POWER ON. THE CELL PHONES WERE INDIVIDUALLY WRAPPED IN BUBBLE WRAP. THEY WERE THEN PLACED IN GROUPS OF THREE ON BUBBLE WRAP AND FOLDED A FEW TIMES REPEATING UNTIL ALL WERE WRAPPED INTO ONE BUNDLE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. PRIOR TO THE UNDECLARED DISCOVERY, THE PACKAGE WAS FLOWN ON UPS AIRCRAFT.

item.title: Report E-2024100314
item.description:
Report E-2024100314

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-12T21:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-18
  • City: ELMSFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1240 ET, XPO-XCM notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 2 quarts of weld on duit 411 gray released from a metal pail due to improper loading, box fell crushing some of the pails inside the cardboard box The release impacted just inside the cardboard box. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site.

item.title: Report E-2024100240
item.description:
Report E-2024100240

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-10T09:22:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-13
  • City: ROCHESTER
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 11:48 AM ET, XRC contacted the call center to report a spill that occurred inside of a trailer in Rochester, NY. The spill consists of approximately 1 cup of Lithium Hydroxide Monohydrate, which released from 2 50-pound paper bags due to punctures by the previous terminal. The bags were taped up and moved to XRC, but the 1 cup of residual powder was what remained on the pallet and trailer floor. The contractors containerized product and cardboard to (1) 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged on site for terminal personnel to manage.
